name: Heart Heist (jnuccitelli)
description:
Heart Heist is a single player minion based tower defense game where you must prove that your dead son is worthy of sharing the pharaoh's heart! Survive increasingly difficult waves of enemies by summoning minions and tapping your own life force to unleash deadly power ups. Can you survive the tomb of the pharaoh?!?

All SFX and Music were created and mixed during this game jam.

Game Design by: Alexander Nuccitelli, Arjun Kurkal, Jenna Plute, and Joseph Nuccitelli

Coding by: Alexander Nuccitelli, Arjun Kurkal, Joseph Nuccitelli

Art by: Jenna Plute

Original Soundtrack by: Alexander Nuccitelli

Sound Effects by: Alexander Nuccitelli, Joseph Nuccitelli

Tools Used:

-Unity Game Engine

-Musescore 4 (with muse sounds)

-Audacity

-Github

-Google Drive

-Adobe Photoshop CS5

-Clip Studio Paint

Controls (The in game tutorial is quite good and should teach you everything, use this only for reference!):

Note: Not all buttons are available from the beginning of the game.

-‘W’ and ‘S’ or arrow keys to move up and down.

-’1’ key to buy a bear.

-’2’ key to buy a fox.

-’3’ key to buy an elephant.

-’f’ key to summon a wall of fire.

-’r’ key to gain money.

Font: Inknut Antiqua - Google Fonts
